title: What are the 4 literary devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: This sounds like a homework question. If it is, it’s cheating to ask others to do your reading, thinking, and writing for you. If it isn’t, please explain the purpose of the question in a comment to me, and I will gladly consider revising or deleting this answer.
There are thousands of literary devices. Thousands. Not four. My advice is to ask the question “what is a literary device?” That will get you a lot further.
